early_life_description: Born in London and raised in Chingford, David showed a passion for football from an early age, often practicing for hours with his father.
young_adult_description: Joined Manchester United's youth academy and made his professional debut in 1992, quickly becoming one of the world's best midfielders.
adult_life_description: Played for Manchester United, Real Madrid, LA Galaxy, and Paris Saint-Germain. Married Victoria Adams in 1999, forming one of the world's most famous celebrity couples.
late_life_description: Retired from football in 2013 and became a global ambassador and businessman, co-owning Inter Miami CF.

early_life_description: Grew up in London and trained as a hairdresser.
adult_life_description: Supported her son's early football career and became known for her dedication to her family.
late_life_description: Lives privately, enjoying time with her grandchildren.

early_life_description: Born in London and worked in local trades from a young age.
young_adult_description: Married Sandra West in 1969 and became father to David Beckham and his sisters.
adult_life_description: A passionate Manchester United supporter who helped train his son David from childhood.
late_life_description: Retired and occasionally appears in family events.

early_life_description: Born in Essex to a wealthy family and showed early interest in dance and music.
young_adult_description: Rose to fame in the 1990s as 'Posh Spice' in the Spice Girls, the best-selling girl group of all time.
adult_life_description: Married David Beckham in 1999 and launched her own successful fashion brand in the 2000s.
late_life_description: Continues to manage her fashion label and support philanthropic causes.

early_life_description: Raised in Hertfordshire and worked in insurance before starting a family.
young_adult_description: Married Anthony Adams and had three children, including Victoria.
adult_life_description: Supported Victoria's music and fashion careers.
late_life_description: Lives privately and remains close with her family.

early_life_description: Born and raised in Hertfordshire, worked in engineering and business.
young_adult_description: Married Jacqueline Cannon and became a successful electronics businessman.
adult_life_description: Supported his family and helped provide a comfortable upbringing for his children.
late_life_description: Retired and enjoys time with grandchildren.

early_life_description: Born in London, eldest child of David and Victoria Beckham.
young_adult_description: Pursued photography and modeling, gaining media attention for his creative work.
adult_life_description: Married Nicola Peltz in 2022 and continues working in creative media.
late_life_description: Continues public life in Los Angeles with his wife.

early_life_description: Second son of David and Victoria Beckham, grew up between London and Los Angeles.
young_adult_description: Pursued football and modeling, signing with Brentford B and Puma.
adult_life_description: Emerging athlete balancing football and media work.
late_life_description: Expected to continue in professional sports.

early_life_description: Born in Madrid while David played for Real Madrid.
young_adult_description: Developed interest in music and performance.
adult_life_description: Pursuing a career in pop music.
late_life_description: Active on social media and involved in entertainment projects.

early_life_description: Youngest child and only daughter of David and Victoria Beckham.
young_adult_description: Growing up in London with interest in fashion and art.

early_life_description: Born into the Peltz family in New York, raised in a creative household.
young_adult_description: Started acting as a teenager, appearing in 'Transformers: Age of Extinction.'
adult_life_description: Married Brooklyn Beckham in 2022 and continues to work in film and fashion.

early_life_description: Raised in the US and worked as a model before marriage.
young_adult_description: Married Nelson Peltz and raised eight children.
adult_life_description: Involved in philanthropy and family business ventures.

early_life_description: Born in Brooklyn, New York and began his career delivering frozen food.
young_adult_description: Built a business empire through acquisitions and investments.
adult_life_description: Co-founded Trian Fund Management and serves on several major corporate boards.
late_life_description: Remains an influential figure in global finance.

early_life_description: First grandchild of David and Victoria Beckham.
Younger sister of David Beckham, raised in Chingford.
young_adult_description: Worked in events and business management.
adult_life_description: Runs lifestyle ventures and remains close to her brother David.
